# Test Fixtures

Place test audio files here for integration testing.

## Recommended Test Files

- `test_loud_speech.wav` - High volume speech for loudness testing
- `test_soft_speech.wav` - Quiet/mumbled speech
- `test_monotone.wav` - Flat pitch for pitch variation testing
- `test_expressive.wav` - Varied pitch
- `test_fading_energy.wav` - Energy drops off at end (stamina testing)
- `test_child_voice.wav` - Child speaker sample

## Using Existing Audio

You can also use the existing test files in the project root:
- `audio1.mp3`
- `audio2.mp3`
